suite.name: 3 Contacter-Hote & RobotFramework Chaima BEN HADDA & Connexions-Valides
3 Contacter-Hote

test.name: Contacter l'hôte - 01 - Succès de l'envoi (Scénario Nominal)

kw.name: Ouvrir Le Navigateur Et Accéder A La Page d'Accueil
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Remplir Le Formulaire De Contact
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Ceci est un message de test valide.' into text field 'xpath=//textarea[@name='message']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.arg: Ceci est un message de test valide.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Vérifier L'Envoi Réussi
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.
Vérifie le message de retour et ferme la modale.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: Vérifie l'envoi d'un message avec tous les champs valides. Le test passe si le serveur renvoie une réponse (même l'erreur d'envoi d'email).

test.name: Contacter l'hôte - 02 - Échec : Nom manquant

kw.name: Ouvrir Le Navigateur Et Accéder A La Page d'Accueil
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.msg: Typing text 'Test sans nom' into text field 'xpath=//textarea[@name='message']'.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Demande d'info' into text field 'xpath=//input[@name='phone']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Vérifier L'Échec De L'Envoi (Modale Reste Ouverte)
Run Keyword And Ignore Error
Wait Until Element Does Not Contain
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` does not contain ``text``.

kw.arg: Wait Until Element Does Not Contain
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.
Vérifie qu'aucun message de succès n'apparait (validation côté client) et que la modale est toujours là.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: Vérifie que le formulaire n'est pas soumis si le champ Nom est vide.

suite.meta: Tests fonctionnels pour la modale "Contacter l'hôte"

test.name: Test Utilisateur Valide Mot De Passe Vide

kw.name: Ouvrir Le Navigateur Et Accéder A La Page d'Accueil
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Un Message d'Erreur Doit Etre Visible Apres Une Connexion Incorrecte
Accéder A La Page De Connexion
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password

kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Vérifier Que Le Message d'Erreur Est Visible
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
